data.title: Adidas Ultraboost 22 Running Shoes
data.description: High-performance running shoes with BOOST midsole for maximum energy return and comfort.

data.title: Nike Dri-FIT Training T-Shirt
data.description: Moisture-wicking fabric keeps you dry and comfortable during intense workouts.

data.title: Wilson Evolution Basketball (Official Size)
data.description: Premium indoor game basketball with a patented laid-in channels for better grip.

data.title: Yoga Mat - 6mm Non-Slip
data.description: Durable and lightweight yoga mat with excellent grip for all types of yoga and fitness routines.

data.title: Hydro Flask Standard Mouth Water Bottle (21 oz)
data.description: Insulated stainless steel water bottle keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours and hot for up to 12.

data.title: Under Armour ColdGear Compression Leggings
data.description: Dual-layer fabric with a warm brushed interior and a slick, fast-drying exterior for cold weather.

data.title: Spalding NBA Official Game Ball
data.description: The official game ball of the NBA, made with high-quality leather for superior performance.

data.title: Garmin Forerunner 955 Solar Watch
data.description: Multi-sport GPS watch with solar charging, advanced metrics, and wrist-based running dynamics.

data.title: Bowflex SelectTech 552 Adjustable Dumbbells (Pair)
data.description: Adjusts from 5 to 52.5 lbs in 2.5 lb increments up to the first 25 lbs. Saves space and is versatile.

data.title: Titleist Pro V1 Golf Balls (Dozen)
data.description: The choice of professionals. Offers exceptional distance, consistent flight, and short game control.

data.title: Babolat Pure Aero Tennis Racket
data.description: Designed for players who seek power and spin. Used by top ATP and WTA players.

data.title: GoPro HERO11 Black Camera
data.description: Waterproof action camera with HyperSmooth 5 stabilization and high-resolution video.

data.title: Fox 40 Classic Whistle
data.description: Pea-less design with a loud, reliable sound. Essential for coaches and referees.

data.title: Mizuno Wave Lightning Z6 Volleyball Shoes
data.description: Lightweight and high-performing shoes offering excellent cushioning and stability for court sports.

data.title: Ski Goggles with Anti-Fog Coating
data.description: UV protection and anti-fog technology for clear vision on the slopes. Over-the-glasses compatible.

data.title: Resistance Band Set (5-piece)
data.description: Includes five different resistance levels for a full-body workout. Comes with a carrying bag.

data.title: New Balance 990v5 Lifestyle Sneakers
data.description: Iconic sneaker known for its comfort, durability, and classic style. Made in the USA.

data.title: Bike Helmet - MIPS Technology
data.description: Advanced bike helmet featuring MIPS (Multi-directional Impact Protection System) for safety.

data.title: Camping Backpack (65L)
data.description: Large capacity internal frame backpack with adjustable torso length, perfect for multi-day hikes.

data.title: Under Armour Storm Half-Zip Pullover
data.description: Water-repellent, breathable pullover with a soft, brushed interior for lightweight warmth.
